酄字的基本解释

酄
huān
中国春秋时鲁国城邑名，在今山东省肥城市。

酄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huān］
［《廣韻》呼官切，平桓，曉。］
古地名。春秋鲁邑。在今山东省宁阳县西北。《说文·邑部》“酄”字下引《春秋传》：“齊人來歸酄。”今本《左传·定公十年》作“讙”。杨伯峻注：“讙在今山東寧陽縣西北三十餘里。”

酄字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　酄； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1279第29
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?呼官切，音歡。【說文】魯下邑。【玉篇】濟北蛇丘縣。【正字通】一作讙。【左傳·定十年】齊人來歸鄆、讙、龜隂之田。【說文】引《傳》作酄。　又【集韻】驅圓切，音弮。鄕名，在聞喜縣。

酄字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
酄字的起名意思

暂无。

酄
Basic explanation of words
酄
huān
In the Spring and Autumn Period of China, the city of Lu was named in Feicheng, Shandong Province.
酄
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huān］
["Guang Yun" Call the official cut, Ping Huan, Xiao. ]
Ancient place names. Spring and Autumn Luyi. In today's northwest of Ningyang County, Shandong Province. "Shuowen·Yibu" quotes "Chun Qiu Zhuan" under the word "酄": "Qi people come back to you." The current edition of "Zuo Zhuan·Dinggong Ten Years" is made "讙". Yang Bojun's note: "The government is now more than 30 miles northwest of Ningyang County, Shandong."
酄
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【You Jixia】【Yi Zi Department】　酄; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1279 29
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Call the official cut, the sound is happy. [Said Wen] Luxiayi. [Jade articles] Sheqiu County, Jibei. 【Zhengzitong】One for all. [Zuo Zhuan·Ding ten years] The people of Qi come back to the fields of Yun, Ying, and Guiyin. [Said the text] quoted from "Biography" as 酄.　[Jiyun] Drive round and cut, sound. Chinese name, in Wenxi County.
